评论详情: I love the color and the fit!  Very flattering to the body.  I bought this dress to go on a tropical vacation and it’s perfect.  I also love how comfortable it is to wear.  Don’t hesitate to buy.
I ordered this dress for a vacation and just didn't care for the quality of the fabric or the way the top part fit. Unfortunately I had to return it.

Based on the reviews and LTK, I thought this dress would be perfect for my winter vacation. I opted for the light purple color. However, the material is thin, which is nice for warmer climates, but the color shows off every roll and imperfection. I am 5'2", 160 lbs, and carry my weight in my midsection. This dress did not work in my favor. I may order the black or a darker color to see how that looks.
Like it
Very cute, flattering, but not the most comfortable material.
I really wanted to love this dress but I ended up returning it. I’m 5’3 for reference and I didn't like where the length hit on my legs.
The dress fits perfectly, and I absolutely love the style and color. I loved it so much that I ended up purchasing a second one!
I just had a baby not too long ago and I am still well over weight. I hate most things on me right now, but this made me look and feel so good. I love this dress!
This dress runs like two sizes too small if you have a chest! I love love the style, though!
I have 4 or 5 of these dresses but the purple one I just purchased is awful… skin tight & totally see through. Same size and brand as my prior purchases.
Bought this dress for Italy and loved it. The pink color is amazing. For someone who doesn’t look good in most midi length dresses this was perfect.

评论概述: Great for summer, wouldn’t buy light colors
评论详情: The fabric was light and airy and color vibrant. I returned because I don’t think it was flattering on my body shape (more athletic mom shape). One down side was it might be perceived as see-through, but wear undergarments and you should be okay. I wouldn’t trust lighter colors though. Loved the U-shape of the bottom and the elastic waist! That seemed very forgiving and size-versatile

The fabric feels really cheap and itchy. The slit goes so far up on my leg I’ll have to be careful wearing it returns in our area are such a hassle so I guess I’ll keep it, but not the quality I was hoping for.
I hated the style of this dress. The color was pretty though. I immediately returned.
Even an XL was way too small. Fabric feels cheap and thin. Returning today.

评论概述: Perfect for a hot summer day
评论详情: Fits perfectly true to size. Received so many compliments.

评论概述: Travels well and is very versatile
评论详情: I really like this dress, I have it in blue and black. It is very comfortable and the fabric doesn’t wrinkle when traveling. You can wear this dress for fancy events for work or just to a dinner with family. I would recommend for any situation!

I bought this dress for my grandmothers 95th birthday... I love the color and it fits great.. but as soon as I went to put it on the strap broke in the back and is about to break in the front. I'm going to fix the stitch myself because I have no other choice. Just beware
Had a feeling this was going to be slightly smaller than the size I ordered and I was right. Would have been cute though if it was sized properly. Unfortunately it went back.

评论概述: Flattering but don't wear if there's a possibility you will be sweating
评论详情: This dress is very airy and comfortable... however, I wore it to an outdoor summer wedding and it showed every possible drop of perspiration that one could think of. I would only recommend a dark color.
They would have been really cute but they are way to small for the size they say
The dress was see through and if your curvy go up a size or two, the dress is very straight

Pros: cute & flowy, adjustable straps. Cons: color was darker than what is shown, cheap material, super wrinkly, and most importantly the dress I received had clearly been worn before as it had a safety pin holding the strap together!
Not only is it sized at least 3 sizes too small, but it’s completely see-through. Just terrible.

评论概述: Generally like the look, but poor sewing gives it irredeemable flaws.
评论详情: I really liked the idea of this dress, and it was mostly ok, especially for the price. I did fail to size up appropriately - I'm 5'3", 135lbs, 36C and usually hover between Small and Medium, so went Medium here -- could have benefited from a Large in the chest, it pulled taut across my girls and was a smidge too high-waisted (that part's not unusual for me, as I have a long torso). But the thing that was the dealbreaker was the sewing on the bodice under the "flap" overlay -- it's sewn "inside out" with the seam allowances on the outside. That wouldn't be a huge deal thanks to being covered by the aforementioned flap, BUT there are also bust darts that are inexplicably sewn on the outside too - so they cause weird bumps in the overlay itself and detract from the overall effortless, smooth look. I'm returning.
I have this dress in every color. It’s very forgiving.
Very comfortable and fits nicely. Looks very pretty on and seems like it will hold up well.
Everyone loves it
220lbs and the largest size still didn't fit
This is the perfect summer dress. Light weight, flattering, comfortable, cute. I’ve worn it once a week since I’ve purchased it. I need it in more colors

评论概述: High side slits for taller gals
评论详情: Wish slits not so high on sides. Fit was tighter than expected

Tight around the breast area! I'm usually a size small in dresses which that's what i ordered but sadly it was tight on my boobs. Returned the small and got a medium and it stills fits tight. But I'm keeping it

I didn’t like the style once I had it on. It fit perfectly though. For reference, I am 5‘2“ tall and I stay between 125 and 130 pounds. My bra size is 32DDD. I ordered a small. The fabric looks cheap,  in my opinion.
Love this dress. So airy and comfy. Good for evey day or to dress it up!
Made of thin material. Very cute, but doesn’t look right on my body shape, way too tight
This dress runs small … not us sizing
This dress is decent, color was vibrant and true to pic. Just wasn’t very flattering on me, think it would be better on those with a smaller bust. Fairly wrinkle resistant fabric.
Love it perfect for summer and affordable
Cute and comfortable for this summer.

This dress is really lightweight ; perfect for hot weather ! Very breathable and comfortable . I wore it on our boat , it dries easily , flows beautiful in the wind, and is so comfortable. I ordered it on 3 more colors I love it so much !
Item runs very small. Bought two and neither fit.

评论概述: Fabric is extremely thin and transparent
评论详情: Do not buy, waste of money

评论概述: Not for all body types but cute.
评论详情: Material was thin as advertised, has a good looking. I returned mine because I didn't like how it fitted on me. But keep on my mind that not all dresses will fit and make you confortable. The dress is cute. Good price.

Looks like it was sold at Joyce Leslie- I may be saying myself - but cheap. Quality, fabrics, everything from the hem to the shoulders scream cheap! I purchased it for vacation but it did not pass the test so unfortunately it was returned
Unfortunately the hot pink is see through - this works for a swimsuit coverup, but not as a dress unless you have a slip underneath it. Bummed I missed the return window.

As others have said, there isn't enough room in the chest area and I am not huge in the bust. I am going to give this dress away.The seams of the darts under the overlay at the chest area are on the outside instead of the inside.  This makes a noticeable lump line under the top flap area.......wrong way to sew this! This was cheaply made......

This is really cute, but it runs small. It’s especially tight in the stomach and waist, and it doesn’t have a lot of stretch so it’s not flattering. It is a cute dress and the colors is pretty. Just wish I had sized up!
I just didn’t like the way it looked on. Thin material but not see through (grayish color). The color wasn’t great on me, didn’t feel flattering in my slightly apple shaped body. Meh.
The dress is in a beautiful color and fits perfectly.
So cute but can’t with a tear on the front.
The color is beautiful. However the fit is just kind of weird, especially in the hat area.
Loved dress fit and color but it was so sheer you could see my underwear print through the dress, and I was wearing the same color as the dress. Returned
Very cute dress, but it was too small. It's tight and not stretchy so it didn't fit right.
Honestly not what I expected, it feels cheap, it’s kind of see through and it’s scratchy. I bought the same style on Shein for half the price and the fabric is softer, and the fit is better
I ordered this dress in purple rose, and it looks just as vibrant as in the photo. I ordered a Small. It fits me very well and isn’t too long on my 5’1” frame. Absolutely love it!
I want this dress in every color! So comfortable and great for a Florida summer. Wore it on our cruise and plan to wear it all summer!

I was worried about sizing but medium fit perfect with a little room to spare. Back has elastic so no issue with being too tight in breast area, hides my little belly beautiful and isn’t see through. For the price- it’s a perfect dress for vacation or cookout.
This dress is the perfect light weight material.  The cute over lay on the chest area is a cute added touch.  Love that is has adjustable straps.

I got this dress from Nordstrom Rack in hot pink and am so happy to find the exact same one in different colors. Super flattering and I get so many compliments every time I wear it. Would order in every color!
